content.question:
The business cycle diagram below shows the cyclical movement of actual real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> relative to potential real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> over time for the nation of Galactica.

The economy of Galactica is expanding and the actual unemployment rate exceeds the natural rate of unemployment for which year in the above diagram?

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
